encyclopedia.content: 日本动漫《海贼王》中的人物，是路飞最尊敬的人，四皇之一。为人随和，性格开朗，有犹如大海的心胸。能忍受别人对他的一切侮辱，就是不能忍受他人欺负他的朋友。

entry.def: The shank of an object is the long, thin, straight part of the object.

example.ex: These hooks are sharp with long shanks.
example.tran: 这些钩身长的鱼钩很锋利。

entry.def: Shanks are the lower parts of the legs; used especially with reference to meat.

example.ex: Turn the shanks and baste them once or twice as they cook.
example.tran: 将小腿肉翻一下，烹调时在上面抹一两次油。
